6 void GoalGeneratorNearest2D::evalGoal(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &pose) {
7  const double &r = goal_dist_from_obj_;
8  geometry_msgs::Vector3 &translation = pose.transform.translation;
9  geometry_msgs::Quaternion &rotation = pose.transform.rotation;
10 
11  double alpha = atan2(translation.y, translation.x);
12 
13  translation.x = translation.x - r * cos(alpha);
14  translation.y = translation.y - r * sin(alpha);
15  translation.z = 0;
16 
17  Converter::setQuaternionRotation(rotation, RPY{0, 0, alpha});
18 }
